backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a note-taking system with CRUD operations and break reminder functionality, storing user-specific notes and reminders with timestamp tracking and notification queue management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the Internet Identity login blank page bug fix in the browser extension content script, linking manifest.json and content script files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including React components, hooks, content scripts, and configuration files for the Companion Dog browser extension.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for the companion dog UI.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Chrome extension manifest v3 configuration with permissions, host permissions for IC domains, content scripts, web accessible resources, and CSP for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/scripts/build-extension.js: Node.js build script that copies manifest, assets, and creates a placeholder content.js, then packages everything into a zip file for extension distribution.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Landing page React component with Internet Identity login, extension download functionality, feature descriptions, and installation instructions for the Companion Dog browser extension.
frontend/src/content/BreakNotification.t: Full-screen modal component displaying break reminder notifications with snooze and dismiss buttons, styled with green theme and coffee icon.
Settings panel component for configuring break reminder intervals with local storage persistence, error handling, success feedback, and loading states.
frontend/src/content/content.tsx: Content script entry point that creates a shadow DOM container, injects styles, and renders the DogOverlay with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/content/DogOverlay.tsx: Main component for the draggable dog companion overlay that manages state for position, animations, authentication, notes panel, break reminders, and displays random encouraging messages.
Renders four circular gradient buttons (feed, pet, notes, break reminder) with icons and hover effects for interacting with the dog companion.
frontend/src/content/MessageBubble.tsx: Displays a speech bubble above the dog with animated entrance effects showing encouraging messages or notifications.
frontend/src/content/messages.ts: Exports an array of 20 encouraging messages and a helper function to randomly select one for display.
frontend/src/content/NotesPanel.tsx: Panel component for creating, editing, and deleting user notes with error handling, using React Query hooks for backend synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on notes (useNotes, useCreateNote, useEditNote, useDeleteNote) and hooks for break reminder management (useSetBreakReminder, useProcessNotifications), all using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS with Tailwind directives, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, font imports (Nunito and Quicksand), and custom animation utilities (fadeIn, slideInFromBottom, zoomIn).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Nunito, Quicksand), OKLCH-based color system, custom border radius values, shadows, and accordion animations, plus typography and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a browser extension with dog companion overlay featuring encouragement messages, feeding/petting interactions, note-taking, and break reminders, built with Manifest V3 and packaged as a Chrome extension.
